ul.li: Santa Clara Valley, California, United States

div.p: We're looking for a driven and dedicated senior Systems QA engineer to lead testing on new technologies. As a member of our fast-paced group, you will have the unique and rewarding opportunity to be part of a new project and shape upcoming products that will delight and inspire millions of Apple’s customers every day. Quality is an important aspect of our innovative products, and as a System QA Engineer, you will have a significant impact on helping to deliver functional and stable products to millions of customers in a fast-paced environment. The ideal candidate will possess an energetic personality with excellent communication and interpersonal skills, attention to detail, patience, and a passion for product usability.

ul.li: 3+ years of SQA or System Test experience, preferably on consumer-facing hardware/software products.
Experience with hardware and/or software development lifecycle processes.
Experience with testing consumer computer and/or mobile devices.
Ability to work with cross-functional and remote teams
Demonstrates QA skills with at least 2 complete product cycles, from concept to customer shipment.
Ability to communicate technical concepts to a non-technical audience
Ability to solve difficult problems with innovative and maintainable solutions
Must be detail oriented and strive for product excellence

div.p: -Reviewing and testing hardware and software features of one or more products. -Identifying important and relevant customer scenarios, integrating test cases from those scenarios based on risks, and executing them. -Work closely with development teams, to identify and understand key features and their underlying functionality. -Working closely with other team members & test teams to create and execute tests cases. -Isolate and report defects effectively quantifying customer impact, and verify fixes through regression testing and other test methodologies. -Analyzing data from test results; generate reports from that data.

Scripting automation experience (ie, Python, Perl, etc.) Developing and executing testing using computer vision and robotics solutions. Testing experience with machine learning Strong data analysis & tools experience (Excel or Numbers required; Matlab, LabView or similar tools preferred)
